name: Chicken Pasta With Cheesy White Sauce Recipe | Zarnak Sidhwa | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chicken Pasta With Cheesy White Sauce Recipe: Chicken Boneless ½ kg Macaroni (boiled ) ½ packet Black Pepper 1 tsp Soy Sauce 1 tbsp Chili Sauce 2 tbsp Oil 2 tbsp Ginger Garlic 1 tsp Butter 50 gms Milk ½ litre Plain Flour 1 tbsp Black Pepper ½ tsp Salt ½ tsp Cheddar Cheese 1 cup Green Peas 1 cup Corns 1 cup
instructions: In a pan, heat oil add garlic and fry. When fry well, add black pepper, salt, soy sauce, chili sauce, chili sauce, boiled Macaroni and removes from the stove. In a pan, heat butter add plain flour and fry. When aroma comes, add milk, black pepper, salt, green peas, corns and Cheddar Cheese. Now take it out in a dish, pour white sauce and serve. Chicken Pasta with cheesy White Sauce is ready.
